summary:
Sales Engineer supporting growth of Digital Enterprise Solutions (DES) at Yokogawa.

Experienced Sales Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the technical and commercial aspects of process and industrial automation. Skilled in Sales, Project and Risk Management, Process Engineering, and Petroleum Engineering.

Diving into the world of data science and big data.

•	Development scenarios and cost estimative by modelling FDP using Questor;
•	Global CAPEX trend analysis for upstream, downstream and power segments;
•	Supported clients providing details of Brazilian regulatory framework (concession, production sharing agreement and transfer of rights);
•	Benchmarking studies of contracts (drilling ships, AHTS, helicopters, gas turbines maintenance and logging services) comparing local contracts to international contracts of IOCs;
•	Studies to support companies to obtain funding and review business plans.
I also participated in a competitive assessment for an International Oil Company, which consisted in performing a complete assessment of results from Brazil’s 11th, 12th and 1st PSA bidding rounds; comprehensive review of M&A, farm-ins and farm-outs activities in upstream segment; competitive assessment of Brazilian-based E&P Companies indicating whether they are currently expanding, maintaining, reducing or exiting; and develop implications for client.
Besides performing consultancy services, I was in charge of identification of potential opportunities, defining the scope of technical proposals, workload estimation and deadlines to accomplish these projects. Lead of few consulting projects (over £150k) and project team.', 'title': 'Upstream Consultant', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 16978, 'name': 'Siemens-Chemtech', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGqAfIeQurloQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1617213483236?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=kvx9WXNjIL2Uwqr_AipgYUIB2rJhGBnwi10mPCuqW5c', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/chemtech/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Rio de Janeiro Area, Brazil', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'Chemtech', 'description': 'At Siemens-Chemtech I had three different roles due to promotions with increasingly responsibility level: Team Leader; Senior Engineer and Risk Consultant.

•	Coordinated a staff of 15 people, support in technical decisions and check/ approval of documents.
•	Supported commercial area by defining Engineering scope in technical proposals, estimating workloads to accomplish these projects.
•	Planning and resources allocation.
•	Assisted in planning and to accomplish the deliverables of projects.

Acting as Senior Engineer
Design of onshore and offshore units in all phases (conceptual, basic, FEED and detailing) in compliance with regulatory and project standards, and contract requirements.

Acting as Risk Consultant
Identification, assessment and proposing mitigating measures to reduce risk in industrial facilities, providing consultancy in risk analysis in a diversity of infrastructure sectors: petroleum and gas (upstream and downstream), petrochemical, mining, railways and ports.

Experience in coordinating technical meetings with Clients, Engineering companies and Technology Licensor in both Portuguese and English languages.
